title: Enhancing Patient Care Competencies: TTS-Based Social Education Innovation—Mobile Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of social phenomena with over 80% accuracy through TTS-based lectures.
Learners complete practical tasks analyzing social issues using audio and visual materials in a mobile environment with a 90% completion rate.
Learners demonstrate critical thinking by solving over 75% of social case study problems presented in formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
